html:
seventy years. SeeJeremiah 25:9-11; Jeremiah 27:2-7 . From the first year of Nebuchadnezzar (496 B.C.) to the conquest of Babylon by Cyrus (426 B.C.)

one. Hebrew. ehad , a compound unity, hence"one" of a dynasty, here, the Babylonian dynasty. Not yahid , a single one. See note onDeuteronomy 6:4 .
